title: US Patent Office issues new guidelines for AI-assisted inventions
description: The U.S. Patent and Trademark Office issued new guidelines on Wednesday outlining when inventions created with the help of artificial intelligence can be patented.
content:
Nov 26 (Reuters) - The U.S. Patent and Trademark Office issued new guidelines on Wednesday outlining when inventions created with the help of artificial intelligence can be patented.

title: Alibaba's cloud business revenue soars 34% driven by AI boom
description: HONG KONG — China’s Alibaba Group posted a 34-percent jump in revenue from its cloud business in its most recent quarter, buoyed by the boom in artificial intelligence (AI).
content:
HONG KONG — China’s Alibaba Group posted a 34-percent jump in revenue from its cloud business in its most recent quarter, buoyed by the boom in artificial intelligence (AI).

title: HP to cut thousands of jobs
description: (UPDATE) SAN FRANCISCO, California — Computer and printer maker HP announced Tuesday a sweeping restructuring plan that will eliminate about 10 percent of its workforce globally as the company pivots toward artificial intelligence (AI) to boost efficiency.

title: Dell bets on rising AI server demand to forecast higher growth
description: DELL forecast fourth-quarter (Q4) revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, as increasing investments in data centers to support artificial intelligence (AI) boost demand for its servers, sending its shares up 4 percent in extended trading.

title: AI Agent Platforms: The Future of Automated Workflows
description: As artificial intelligence continues to evolve, businesses are rapidly adopting AI agent platforms to streamline processes, boost productivity, and reduce operational costs. title: 'Cognitive Legos' help the brain build complex behaviors
description: Artificial intelligence may write award-winning essays and diagnose disease with remarkable accuracy, but biological brains still hold the upper hand in at least one crucial domain: flexibility.
content:
Artificial intelligence may write award-winning essays and diagnose disease with remarkable accuracy, but biological brains still hold the upper hand in at least one crucial domain: flexibility.
